document_data.name: Trevis Uhl
document_data.mainbody: '''Trevis Uhl''' was an innkeep inhabiting the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He ran [[the Defiant Gesture]] located on the west side of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on the south bank of the [[River Tesh]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Possessions: Trevis carried an enchanted [[claymore]] and wore a [[silver]] necklace that had the magic of a ''[[ring of protection]]''.
document_data.History: Trevis was a [[Zhentilar]] soldier in Zhentil Keep during the destruction of the city in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}. He abandoned the fight after seeing holy fire consume much of the city.
